Marc Perkel wrote:
> But - MY POINT IS - catching the phrase "risk-free" in the ad portion
> of a non-spam is not a false positive because those lines are
> technically spam 

No.  They.  Are.  Not.

Those lines are technically *advertising*.

Spam is unsolicited bulk *EMAIL*.

If you do not understand this, then lease kindly STFU.

Thanks,

rOD.
